title: MetadataHierarchyDetector Fixed & Tested
details:
Completed implementation and testing of the MetadataHierarchyDetector class with the correct hierarchy mapping:

**Hierarchy Structure:**
- Vault Root (depth 0): No metadata
- Program (depth 1): Program metadata only
- Course (depth 2): Program + Course metadata
- Class (depth 3): Program + Course + Class metadata
- Module (depth 4+): Program + Course + Class + Module metadata

**Key Implementation Details:**
- Fixed the off-by-one error in hierarchy level detection
- Corrected fallback logic to only set program from vault root name if depth > 0
- Added comprehensive unit tests covering all scenarios including vault root, different depths, special characters, and non-existent paths
- Ensured path-based analysis works for non-existent paths (per test expectations)
- All tests now pass successfully

**Files Modified:**
- MetadataHierarchyDetector.cs: Core hierarchy detection logic
- MetadataHierarchyDetectorTests.cs: Comprehensive test coverage

**Test Coverage:**
- All hierarchy depth levels (0-4+)
- Different vault root configurations
- Special characters in paths
- Non-existent paths
- Edge cases and boundary conditions

The implementation correctly maps the YAML hierarchy levels as intended in the vault structure.
